story.text: (Adds details) Jan 3 (Reuters) - MARSH & MCLENNAN COS. INC. (MMC.N) Current Prior Rating Buy Hold Price target $37 $31 --Citigroup analyst Keith Walsh said the key drivers behind the upgrade are the expected sale of Putnam and an improved outlook for the brokerage operations. --Walsh added that enhanced cash flows coupled with debt reduction should lead to a formal share repurchase plan by the insurance broker in 2007. (Reporting by Rakesh Dubey in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - citigroup ups
